The variadic/has_opt.hpp header defines a macro that determines whether or not the __VA_OPT__ construct is supported.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/variadic/has_opt.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_VARIADIC_HAS_OPT
